roleset.name: prove, justify

example.name: substantiate-v: the one example
example.text: Mr. Lewis said [the company]-1 gave the Consumer Affairs department ``volumes of documents'' *trace*-1 to substantiate its statements, and made ``every effort to comply'' with all the agency's policies.

roleset.note: SUBSTANTIATE-V NOTES: More common in the negative adjectival 'unsubstantiated' (eg rumors). (from substantiate.01-v)

roleset.name: significant, ample, solid

role.descr: specific aspect of arg1 that is substantial, if in addition to arg1

example.name: substantial-j: both args
example.text: My main course was substantial in its quantity and substantial in its delivery of enjoyment to my palate.

roleset.note: SUBSTANTIAL-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7. (from substantial.01-j)
